title: Language Cognition Improvement Program Through Music Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music theory and phonological awareness
context.additional_context: A Program for Professionals to Expand Cognitive Flexibility Through Science-Based Learning Outside Work Environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify probabilistic patterns between scales and syllables in artificial language learning tasks with over 70% accuracy
Learners can explain at least three neurophysiological mechanisms underlying the correlation between music training and language cognition
Learners can analyze cognitive processing differences between musicians and non-musicians through ERPs (Event-Related Potentials) data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
